"Boy, you have been admitted to the medicine school and your  
uncle is coming back fron Canada next week," my father told me  
and it was a happy moment.

I was in form five at the boarding school and my friends and I  
had gone drinknig beer in the nearby village.  And we were caught  
red handed there by a form master.
my mother quarrelled with my aunt over me.

I found out accidentaly that while my uncle was away in Canada, my  
aunt had been bedding a young man on a regular basis.

It was during a school holiday - I was found necking a girl in my  
room by my father.

I won the first prize at the science fair, the first of the kind  
at school and I was only in form II then.

A close relative of mine died in a serious car accident.  I was  
one of the first two people to see the corpse and I had to do it.  
 Before going in to see it I was afraid as it was the first time  
that I was seeing a corpse.

a close relative of mine passed away, it was the first time  
that someone so close to me had died.

A person whom I thought to be honest took and spend the little  
money that I had and I had no way of getting any money in the  
few following months.

While watching a religious film, I got very excited and made a  
number of comments which were reproached to me by an elderly  
person who respected me.

I beat up a female friend after I heard the defamatory stories that  
she had been telling.  I was later called to explain my  
behaviour.

some seniors tried to scold and insult some juniors on  
account of what the juniors were supposed to have said at  
secondary school.

an uncle of mine, who was close to me, passed away after  
having had a stroke, before his first daughter could be named.

I could not hold my bladder while making a telephone call  
and ended up wetting myself.

I was made to feel responsible for the emotional state a friend of  
mine was in.
My fiancT left me for my best friend.
People who discriminate other people disgust me.

On New Years eve I drank too much alcohol, so much that I had to  
vomit in the presence of other people.

I have cut loose from my father a few years ago. I know he is  
very sad about this.
A recurrent lovesickness.
The dying of a close member of the family.
Seeing maltreated, dead animals.

A much older man took advantage of me during my childhood (four  
to eight years of age).

my friend needed my help very much and I, at that moment, made  
an end to our relationship.
I passed a very important exam.

a man rang the doorbell and wanted to enter the house with  
violence. I was alone at home that moment.

A friend came to visit me late one night. He promised to stay  
only a quarter of an hour, but he stayed 5 hours !! He didn't  
leave and I was very angry.

I had to terminate a training because I wasn't suited for it. I  
was very sad about this, because I very much wanted to finish  
that training.

I tried to swindle a jeweller because my watch was broken and I  
wanted to have it repaired it was a pity but they detected it.

Someone had to do a lot of efforts to make something work. With  
my help he would have finished much sooner, but I wasn't in the  
mood to help him.
I went to visit friends and it was very companionable.

I wanted to get in contact with a girl I loved, but I was afraid  
she would refuse me.

During military service a superior reproached me unjustly. This  
led to friction in a lot of situations.

Disappointed love. The girl made an end to our relationship while  
I thought she was in love with me.

During military service I heard the story of someone who tried to  
commit suicide and as a result of this got a week custody.

I thought of myself as being clumsy I made love for the  
first time with a girl.

A friend of mine had a bicycle-accident because I pulled at his  
handlebar.

Sitting alone in a quiet room concentrating on things happening  
around me which pleases me.

Sitting alone in a quiet room, concetrating on things happening  
around you. Thoughts come into my mind which make me afraid.

a teacher tells a story which isn't true. It only reflects  
his way of interpreting reality.

I have high expectations for my future but if I pursue the  
subject in this manner I will not attain this.

I heard a broadcasting programme about parapsychology. The people  
in this programme used very difficult words which I couldn't  
understand. They acted exaggerated without showing any feeling.

A girl asked me why I didn't dance. I told her I was ashamed to  
dance. I felt myself ashamed having to tell her this.

I saved up money for a good purpose. As I also have to organise a  
party I am afraid there will rest only a little money for the  
good purpose I feel guilty about this.

During a football game I made an offence towards an acquaintance.  
Later on this acquaintance also tackeled me and the game became  
very rude.

I work at a petrol station. there is a foreigner who wants  
petrol my collegues treat him very impolite.

An uncle of mine who just retired, having worked hard all his  
life, got a cerebral hemorrhage.

A student who lives in the same house where I live is an alcoholic. He  
tries to manipulate other people with his money he has drunk  
too much.

I went to a disco with a friend I started behaving badly  
embarrassing him without reason.

I talked to another student about the notes she got last  
semester, not knowing that she got a lot of bad grades.
I got my drivers licence.

I stayed alone in a house in Great Brittain and there was a  
lot of rumour in the newspaper about a murderer still being free.
my mother was proved to suffer from a very serious disease.

The stories about my aunt who was beaten and humiliated by my  
uncle.

I omitted to do a favor to a friend, while he was very much in  
need for help.
I had a little accident with my boss'car.

Every year during carnival I am very neutralful I have an intense  
feeling of happiness then.

The only event I can remember is having a nightmare I was  
very young (3 years old) I dreamt about a machine which was going  
to crush me.

I am usually angry at myself. This happens often. For instace  
I want to pet without falling in love and it soon proves  
that I have fallen in love with him.

There is a person whom I disgust. Evrey time I see her I get this  
terrible feeling I disgust her whole appearance.

I am angry at someone without a good reason. Later on it  
proves that he didn't do anything wrong.

My mother always evokes feelings of guilt in me. For instance  
I miss the last bus I know she will be concerned for me and  
stay awake till I arrive.

I came again in contact with a girl I liked very much. And  
most important she also liked me.
my father had a cerebral hemorrhage.

During a party I overheard a conversation about china. I  
wanted to give my opinion one of the people came out to be Chinese  
and his opinion was right of course.

an old schoolfriend phoned me to arrange an appointment to  
talk about old memories. I hadn't seen him for 8 years.

Standing in a crowed shop or in a closed room with too much  
people in it. This gives me a fearful experience.

my parents behave very "witty" towards me, they make insipid  
jokes about which they laugh. Or my mother who treats me like a  
little child.

Making an unexpected talk with a professor in the canteen. This  
made me shy.

Flirting with other girls while I already had a very good  
relationship. there are problems in my relationship, the  
flirting increases as does the feeling of guilt.

I lived alone in a repulsive area in the city of Rotterdam. I was  
annoyed, heard a lot of Burglary and assaults. Especially in the evening  
and the night I frequently felt anxious.
Being treated unfairly and being hurt by someone I love.

I finished a relation after four years, leading to much  
sorrow for the other one and myself ("although it was the best  
solution").

Every time I meet a certain person. We cannot get on well  
together, we dislike each other.
coming up for trial because of shop lifting.
Being catched stealing.

I fell over head and ears in love with someone who appeared to be  
in love with me. it made me so happy that I could hardly sleep  
and eat for one week.

One night I had to bike home all alone after a party. Then I  
found out that I was pursued by a man in a car.

I had a quarrel with my father, because I was of the opinion that  
he decided in an authoritarian way which TV program we should  
watch. I became very angry and started throwing things through  
the room.

I was catched when, as a little girl, I played tricks. I was very  
startled then and wet my pants.

I was of the opinion that 12.00 pm was too early to be back at  
home after going out, so I stayed away longer, knowing that my  
mother would be worried.
I was called and invited to have a talk about a job I wanted to have.

Once late at night (around midnight) a person asked me to give  
him a lift. He suddenly tried to attack me but I could escape.  
After this he followed me for a little while.

There was a lot of irritation between me and a person who lives  
in the same house where I live. Suddenly it became too much for me and I  
accused him of several things.

The end of a relationship (after 4 years) by doing this I hurt  
the other person very much.

I saw a terrible accident in which the driver of a motor was  
thrown through the frontwindow of a car. His face was completely  
away.

I am troubled by hair growing in my neck. I was troubled by this  
for a long time and was much ashamed someone brought his/her  
hands close to my face.
a friend of me came for an unexpected visit.
I thought the house was on fire at night.

I was at an official meeting I asked a question to a person.  
His response was not directed at me but at the chairman.
the mother of a good friend of mine died.

A teacher was very blunt in his relation to a child so that the  
child was very upset arriving at home.
I was very angry at someone.
That I didn't take the time to make an appointment with someone.

After I saw my family and good friends back after staying one  
year in a foreign country.

a good friend of mine behaved in a very cool manner to me  
for a very long time.

I was in the library of medical psychology and walked into the  
wrong direction. A man who came out of a room threated me very  
denigrating and I became very angry in a resisting manner.

A good friend of mine died. During the funeral I felt an intense  
feeling of sadness.

an uncle of mine who is very ill started to cough wich  
sounded very dirty. (He can't help it of course).

At Christmas night there was a good movie on television which I  
wanted to see for years. I was whining about it till someone told  
me it was very childish. Then I felt shame.

A good friend of mine who is at the moment in a foreign country.  
I didn't write her for several months and now I feel guilty.

I go out with my friend with enough money and good sense to  
our favorite dancing.
going out I am threatened regularly by two punk-girls.
A friend started to shout at me. He called me an old frump.

My father is someone I disgust. So he comes close to me  
a feeling of disgust overwhelms me. I stay a week-end at my  
parent's place I will remember it for long time.

After a party in which I made love with a boy in public. Later on  
I heard that others were talking about me and called me a slut.

I got associated with a boy one year ago, I neglected my  
best friend. the relation with this boy finished she behaved  
very easy-going towards me. I felt guilty then.

I made the winning goal during a very important football  
game.

A terrible cloud-burst started we were camping in a tent on  
a great bald field.

Seeing for the first time pictures about the so called  
"treatment" of Jewish people in Nazi-Germany during World War II.

The death of my mother-in-law after a long sick-bed. at the  
moment of dying I was with her.

I was looking at a one-man show on television. He told very  
disgusting things so that I started to be disgusted with it.  
(Later on it proved that this was his intention).

I was drinking a glass of wine and eating something there  
suddenly appeared pictures about the famine in some parts of  
Africa.

it appeared that I was not pregnant I was several weeks  
overtime.

The same situation as with sadness. I was afraid about what my  
parents would further do to distroy my relationship.
Once again my parents distroyed a relationship.

I had this feeling my parents distroyed a relationship with  
a boy because they thought he was bad and irresponsible.

After the accident which I described in SHAME. I came to myself  
and saw how terrible everything looked like. I disgusted myself  
and everything I saw.

I heard part of a conversation in which one talked very low about  
women.
In an important situation for me, my father behaved inadequately.
I took the car of someone without saying it to him.

a good friend of me told me one evening that she didn't want  
to live anymore.

I felt anger at the end of a telephone call, a good friend  
told me that she would go to travel next year with another good  
friend. We couldn't talk this out.

I was very sad I had to leave persons with whom I had a very  
intense relationship I also had to leave the environment which  
was part of this.

I felt disgust after watching a picture on television about  
torturing political prisoners in India (this happened in the  
India of Indira Ghandi).

I made a very insulting remark against a person whom I care for  
very much. This event was caused by a third person who didn't  
like the person I insulted.

I felt guilt towards my mother I went to live on rooms in  
Nijmegen where I study.

I walk through streets late at night. This is because I and  
my friends were attacked one night without any reason for it.

I feel disgust hearing or seeing other people being treated  
inhumanely. For example torturing in chili.

In my opinion guilt is a feeling which goes together with shame.  
Here then I refer to the situation of guilt.
The day I heard that I passed the high school exam.

I was living in rooms in a very lonely, quiet neigbourhood.  
During the night it was very silent and this frightened me. The  
fact of being alone in that house frightened me.

We had to move to a very different city because the company where  
my father worked also moved to that place. It was very difficult  
for me to make new friends than.

A very close friend of mine died. I read it in the newspaper. I  
didn't know what to do and thought about it the whole day.

A girl who also hires a room in the house where I live always  
tries to make a quarrel with everyone available she disgusts me.

A teacher spent a lot of time helping me without wanting to be  
paid for it. For the exam I didn't got a good grade and I felt  
ashamed.

I knew I had to take an exam very soon but yet I couldn't start  
studying. I also knew it was very imprtant to succeed the exam  
this time.

Christmas holiday started, I felt very neutralful I  
finished my last exam.

I was raped once I went through a dark alley at the back of  
our house. The man pushed me in the bushes. I fought back and  
succeeded to escape.

my gradmother died.  I felt very sad then ... The feeling  
started to be worse after a while.
I ate a rotten apple.

I didn't meet an appointment I had made. The person phoned  
me but I thought of something (I told I was ill) so that I didn't  
have to go.

I slept for the first time all alone in the house where I  
live now. A man phoned me at 2.00 am. He wanted something from

I hadn't been at my parent's place for a long time. I went to  
visit them I had high expectations, but I was there it was  
very different from what I expected.

I read a story in the newspaper about butchers treating their  
animals very badly. They disgusted me.

I was eating in a very nice restaurant, the servant asked  
whether I liked the food I told him that I liked it but that  
there was one thing which wasn't so good. The servant than worked  
very hard to make it good.

A few weeks ago I thought about an exam I had to take soon. I  
remembered this just before I had to go to sleep. I felt guilt  
because at the beginning of the year I planned to succeed.

During my high school time I succeeded to play a concert of  
Mozart on the piano I gave my first performance I succeeded  
to play it very well.

a car ran into me. The moment that I felt on the street I  
thought "This is my end, I am going to die".

our cat was killed in a car-accident I was very angry at the  
driver of the car because he didn't take enough care.

There is a boy who I love very much. I asked him to have dinner  
with me, but he refused I don't know why he didn't go with me,  
but I felt very lonely.
I saw a dog who was eating excrements.

During my Highschool time I was chairman of the student's  
comitee. In this function I once had to make a speech to a large  
audience and I was very nervous. After three sentences I forgot  
my text.

During a holiday in East-Germany I got aquainted with a boy who  
lived there. We started writing, but I only wrote once. I felt  
ashamed because I probably was one of his sparse contacts with

I saw a good friend again after not having seen her for a  
long time.

I slipped on a glazed frost road and a car almost ran into

people without my permission pry in my belongings and take  
things out of it.

I noticed that my parents were not in such a prosperity as  
most people in my surroundings.
Seeing a pornographic movie in which animals were used.
I went for the first time in my life to a nudist-beach.
I was caught sneaking sweets.

I went to visit a friend in the hospital. She had to undergo  
an operation for rupture. I was glad to hear that the operation

I had an appointment with a good friend. He came 3 hours later  
than we agreed upon. During the last hour of waiting I was afraid

I worked together with another student on a computer-assignment.  
She didn't do her best and didn't prepare herself for it. She  
expected me to explain it to her.

I had a quarrel with a good friend about the fact that I didn't  
pay her a visit she expected me to come. Hereafter I was  
very sad because it became a real quarrel.

I was hitch-hiking a man stopped and gave me a lift to

The man was fat and tatooed.
I forgot something I agreed upon with a good friend.

I became very angry with my friend because he didn't do shopping,

I was 12 years old I frequently was pursued by others and  
got sound thrashes.

once again I drank too much and felt very rotten the morning

having a relationship, I made love with another girl.
the girl with whom I am in love smiles at me.

biking and I felt very bad (problems with heart and

a discussion resulted in an insult, which in my opinion, was

I realized that it did not make much sense to start a

I had to finish those big amounts of homework in time.

I gave water to the plants of a friend. Then one plant fell

I had broken a piece of glass of the refrigerator by putting

My father called me (behind my mother's back) and told me that my

A scene in a film in which one man repressed another one. By

I do not succeed in making myself clear to other people.  
they do not understand what I say.
After the death of a girl who I disliked.

I was very startled when, at night at 2.00 am, a boy approached

someone does not listen to me after having asked me to  
repeat what I said. This happened more than one time with the

I felt very sad I heard that a friend had committed suicide.

One night I saw a man being knocked down by two other men. The

I cancelled an appointment with an idle story. Afterwards  
it appeared that the person had looked forward to it and reserved

For a few days I felt very miserable, distressed and listless,

I was testing my new roller skates in the street, suddenly a dog

Recently I felt very sad without any reason. It lasted for a few

Someone told me that he would stay at my home for one night.  
Therefore I made big efforts to make everything ok (food). One day

We had to take our cat to the vet for mercy killing (an

people are eating unsavoury (smacking, belching, speaking

I made an appointment to pick up someone. However I arrived

One night I had a very good conversation with two friends. I then

In the morning just before going to the dentist.

I made love with someone who I didn't really love. Sometimes  
I even considered him unlikable.

I realized that I avoided two good friends with whom I  
always shared toys and sorrows. I made up idle stories to avoid  
telling them what happened to me.

going out in the weekend I have to bike 5 kilometers through  
lonely and dark polders, then I always have terrifying fantasies.

I made an appointment with a friend to drink coffee togehter.

My dear hamster (called Hannes) died at the age of 2 and 1/2 years.  
His shape forced me to mercy killing (an injection).

I read a newspaper report that a little boy was forced to look  
while his sister was raped.

We had made an appointment to complete together a piece of work.  
It appeared that I was the only one who hadn't prepared anything.

I call my mother at least once a week. However last week I

ill.

I had to call someone and make an appointment for a conversation.

When, after having cleaned up the kitchen, two hours later I saw

One night I was called and told that the father of a close friend

funeral I felt very sad.

I cannot remember exactly such a situation. But I know that  
once I went to a very dirty lavatory and that disgusted me.

I once torn the inner tube of a bike, that was not mine. Then I

I found out that the girl, with whom I was in love, loved me

my mother threatened me with thrushing me of the stairs,  
I once more should make a comment.

My mother unjustly became very angry with me and sent me to my

My mother was very angry with my little sister and told her to

A friend came for dinner with me at home. His parents are

Once a week I work as a volunteer in a biologic garden. this work

My friend and I planned to search for old documents and utensils

I went up the stairs in a high, dark house full of shadows,  
passed a door and had the feeling that someone or something was

A friend told me it would be better for me not to be on familiar  
terms with another friend, although, in my opinion he had no  
reason to say such things. He only said so hoping that I  
would search support from him (that, however, was not necessary).

I had a good relationship with two friends. Once without reason,

I see that some people remain cold and egoistic with regard

I state things with great positiveness and try to convince  
others, and it appears that my statement is not right.

A certain friend evokes positive feelings, I am with him but  
negative feelings he is not present. I feel the need to  
express those negative feelings. However, I speak about him,  
I always think: Why do I like this, he does not deserve this, but

A few days ago, I hitch-hiked to Arnhems with a friend.  
Everything went well: they picked us up very quickly, the sun was  
shining, I was feeling free and, for the first time after long  
time, happy. I really had the feeling that I was living at full  
speed.

I had made an appointment with three friends. We had to go out  
together. I arrived at the place, the other persons weren't  
there. I became very angry because I thought they were gone  
without me. That, however, didn't appear to be the case.

I was taking a shower in a cubicle in France. Then I discovered

I know that a certain person feels very lonely, and that she  
always looks forward to seeing me. However, often I am too

A close relative of mine underwent a difficult operation, and everything

I get into the tube or the train without paying for the  
ticket.
I failed the entrance exam to IMEC.
I saw someone eating live worms.

I was a child my parents caught me with a pornographic

[ I can not remember anything in particular.  What I can remember

they told me that I had got a study grant.
I wore a grotesque figure hanging down my back.
Because I had not studied.
my father was saved from a severe work accident.

I was a child I hid under the sheets out of fear of  
darkness.
I first saw a person begging.
my basket ball team lost the qualification at a final.
I see rotten meat.
a person whom I do not want to see is continously present.
I failed an exam I thought I could pass easily.

We hitch hiked our way back from a town rather drunk.  We were

I was to meet a girl in a discotheque.  She was very pretty and I  
was very happy.  But she did not turn up.  Thank God, there were

I went to a pub with a group of friends (not very close) and

The day some friends of mine and I decided to go to Galicia on

Before an exam which I, finally did not take.
At home they lost three pieces of my puzzle.
I had an argument with a friend.
I am dirty because I have not had a shower for a few days.
Once I did not have enough money to pay for a coffee.
After an argument with a friend of mine.
Before taking an exam.

My family told me to leave if I was not willing to accept the  
conditions they imposed on me.

A friend of mine called me I was not at home.  I phoned her  
back to know what she wanted and she told me that she had dialled

I had to change a baby's clothes for the first time.
I fell outside the door of my house.
My younger sister was almost run over by a lorry.

I almost fell down from some rocks because I had been acting

Once I saw some children hunting a cat to death.
The death of a friend.
I saw a scene on T.V where a castration was shown.
Once I answered my father rudely.

I was ten I got shut in the school with a friend.  I had to

I was told that a boy did not want to be my friend without

I learnt that a boy I liked had been with a girl for three

I realized that I had a hole in my trousers after having gone

I saw my 16 year old sister at home after having waited for

While I was waiting for them to give me the marks of the most

I had an argument with my mother because I criticized the rules

On seeing a scene of an accident in a magazine.

A few days back I had to ask a professor a ridiculous question

I shouted at my mother she was nervous and depressed.

I saw a TV program on the North American military plan

I felt angry I saw on T.V the last slaughter of negroes in

I saw the pictures of the draught in Etiopia.
Whenever I see an alcoholic.

I failed an exam for which I knew that I had not studied

The day the Real Madrid team of basket ball qualified for the

The last time I was face to face with with the monstrous dog

During a trivial (friendly) discussion, one of the participants

I heard the last regulation of the socialist govrenment

I got to know the details if the famine in East Africa.

The last time I had to phone the Registry, after having called

I passed an important exam.

In a rather important exam, they caught me red handed

my father addressed me directly and maliciously, thus  
including me in the "family war".
my parents got divorced.

I was a child, one day while playing, I fell up to my waist  
in mud.
I was dismissed from a job after having been accused of theft.

I was with a girl who seemed to love me, while I was with  
her just to go to bed with her.
I passed an exam which I had failed last year.
I go out alone at night.
A murder.
I failed two subjects last year.
I see people who have no sentiments.

I think that I am rather shy and do not mix with people as I

I triffled with other people.

I was told that I could take a week off and go for a trip

Every time I went home with my school report.
I learned that two of my friends had had a serious car accident.
A young man was insulting and humiliating a drunken man.

My aunt phoned me to ask me why I had refused the her invitation

I was with a girl one night and then did not call her again,

I saw that I had passed an exam.  It was the last chance and

On a trip to Santander we wanted to stop at a curve because a

My cousins were playing at home and one of them broke a decorative

All my friends arranged to go for an afternoon snack and they did

I saw a film where a black was rapeing a girl while another one was

I was swimming in the sea and a wave took the top part of my

I was looking after a child and she fell down because I was not

Fights that I see in the middle of the street, robberies, fear of

[ Depressions.]

Some people whom I do not like at all, and one of the reasons is

Some of my friends had an argument.  I had earlier phoned one

I met a very close friend of mine after one year of

There was an earthquake for several minutes and I was on the

An argument among several friends because of the irrational

Pictures of Nazi extermination camps on a T.V program.

I left a boy with whom I was going around without giving him any

my sister was born.
they tried to rob me.

I went to see the doctor and had to take my clothes off so

my parents quarelled over something I had done and which was

my little sister was born.

I was attending an authorized demonstrationand the police

The death of a relative, friend, or someone I esteem.
I saw a very disagreable scene.
I had to represent my boss at a meeting.

I inadvertantly made some close friends and relatives feel

I passed an exam.
they threatened me with a knife to take my money.
I failed an exam I thought I would pass.
my dog died.
I saw an accident where the man lost his head.
I tripped while getting on a bus.
I hurt a person's feelings.
two drug addicts tried to take away my money.

a person saw that I was accused of something I had not done

inadvertantly I found myself in the ladies room.
I broke something and a friend of mine was blamed.

I got my driving licence after they had frightened me with it's

I had to walk over three kms through a field which had wild bulls,

I saw a man hitting a child of 2 years without any consideration,

A friend of mine who was driving a car ahead of me died in a

I had to dissect a live mouse at school.

I was a child I had to recite a poem in a show at the end of

I saw a program on Ethiopia on T.V, a fews hours earlier I

I saw that the mark I had obtained in an exam was a good

We were in the country and I walked away from the others one

I was young, I became very angry as I was not allowed to  
stay up all night for the fair in my town.

summer is over and I have to leave the town where I spend my

I saw several people washing their car with water from a

I inadvertantly entered the ladies room and met some girls

I was entrusted with an object and while using it I handled it

I learned, after the ecography, that my mother was expecting a

One night, walking along a park, I began to think that some

I had an exam and I had it well prepared.  I did the first part  
very well but did not know the second part.
my parents did not let me go on a study tour.

One day I was going through the street door of my house, a  
man asked me for a doctor.  He then showed me his genitals and  
asked me to cure him myself.

An invitation to spend 5 days at the seaside with all expenses  
paid.
A film on zombies.

after a storm in the country, I left my shelter and saw a  
big, fat, slimy green toad by my side.

a friend from whom I preferred to hide my private life  
discovered that I had relations with a man.

I was walking down the street, some boys showed me a knife  
and stole all my money.

they threw my holder down on the floor, with all my notes for  
an exam inside it and they got all mixed up.
my mother was operated.
I see pornographic films.

One day I got on the bus without any money or season ticket and  
the driver threw me out.
a friend of mine was beaten for what was my fault.

My father had an operation which lasted for hours.  We were all

I was walking along a subway I saw a group of louts.  I was  
rather afraid because I was alone.

An old woman was violently thrown down the stairs of the tube by  
a group of louts.

A child, 9 years old, died in a stupid way.  He fell from a place

On the road there was a dead animal with its entrails showing and

We were discussing a subject ( I knew very little about it) and I

I could have passed the last exam of the public competition, but

I phoned two friends and was not able to arrange a meeting with  
either of them, so I had to change my plans.

I am alone at night after having read horror stories, and  
then I heard unexplainable noises.
A typical family argument.
The disqualification of two of my mates in the military service.
The sight of vomit on the street.

criticizing something about a person and then realizing that  
the person whom one is talking to is similar.
I pass an exam.
Continous fear of a nuclear war.

you kill yourself with work and see the number of slakers  
wandering around, doing nothing.
someone in my family died.
To loose friends because of them over-estimating themselves.
people next to me play the fool.
To force someone to do something that suits me.

I thought that I was going to fail a subject and so I began to  
study for the final exam, then my friend told me that I had  
passed it.  That meant that I could go home, as I do not study in  
my hometown.

I was in Sierra Nevada, climbing a peak over 3,000 metres high,  
without any light and with many other problems.  I was afraid for  
my life.

I was living in a flat where things did not go very well for me.   
Finally, they threw me out and this prejudiced people I esteem a  
lot.

I read the diary of the girl with whom I was living, it was  
about another boy with whom she had been going around some time back.
The man who threw me out of the flat disgusted me.

The first time that I caressed a girl, I was about thirteen and  
she was eighteen.  I noticed that it did not affect her at all.

I was going around with a girl without loving her.  Not only did  
I go around with her, but we did many more things.  In the end I  
was not very sincere to her.

I was walking in the countryside alone I came across two  
dogs who began barking at me.  I did not know whether they were  
tied up or loose, but I was afraid of them approaching me.

I was angry my sister began to talk nonsense and to laugh at  
the way I swept the room.  My anger grew (I tried to control  
myself).  After telling her to leave me alone, I vented my anger  
on her as she did not obey me.

My mother was working with a knife and we were all laughing  
heartily.  She was not able to control the knife and stuck it  
deep into her hand.

I read a book whose plot and expressions were obscene and in very  
bad taste.

My mother had just been teaching me how to crochet, which is  
thought highly improper for a boy in a town.  Just we  
finished, a neighbour walked in.

It was about midnight and I wanted to go to the countryside (I  
was in town) to watch the stars in the sky.  My mother did not  
like this, in spite of it I went out for a while.  My mother got  
angry.

A friend of mine suggested that I become a film extra.  The idea  
seemed very funny to me and my reaction seemed rather outlandish  
to the others.

One day I went to the cinema to see a film in which I was  
interested.  On arriving there I saw a long queue (which I had  
not expected) and went back home without seeing the film.

I miss the train and I am late, and I have to wait half an  
hour for the next one.
I knew I had to go out with my mother on some errands.

I saw in an ice-cream kiosque a cockroach walking through a  
cornet.
Once I had some homework to do and I did not do it.

they phoned me from Great-Britain to tell me that I could go  
there, if I wished, in Summer.
I was operated on the knee and had to go through rehabilitation.

In a very important basket-ball match where a lot was at stake, I  
played very badly.

a friend of mine told me that he was going to commit  
suicide.
A TV program on whale-hunting.
Once I said bad things concerning a friend.

Family discord and uneasiness due to something I did not  
communicate on time.

I passed my driving test, as it was the fifth time that I  
had taken this test.
my mother was robbed in a shop.

I was given an exam which I thought did not measure at all my  
ability or my knowledge of the subject.

I saw the film "Johnny got his gun" which deals with the  
consequences of the Vietnam war.

Some friends and I were having lunch.  Someone said something  
funny and one of the guys started laughing and spat his food in a girl's  
face.

I was alone in the bus I tripped and fell, and dropped all  
my papers.

One night, while I was sleeping, I woke up suddenly with the  
sensation that there was someone in my room.
they told me that my grandfather was rather ill.
I see someone vomitting.
I fell head on in a fountain.

I came across a friend with whom I had lost touch for a long  
time.

I had decided to propose to the man I liked to make a trip  
together.  One day, during breakfast I told him my idea.  I was  
afraid of his not accepting it and that the idea would end up as  
a failure.

A person I trusted a lot gave me many false explanations to  
justify a wrong action.

a professor caught me absent-minded and not paying attention  
to what he was saying.

One day, I was alone on duty a patient choked while eating.   
I ran to her and tried to make her breath, but it was too late.

At a party, on New Year's Eve, I met on old friend whom I had not  
seen for some time

Once I failed seven subjects at school and I was terrified to  
give my report card to my father.  I left it on the table and went to  
bed very early in order to avoid him seeing me.

When, after drinking a glass of water, I found a cockroach walking  
out of the glass.

I have a very close friend who lives in another city and we have  
been writing to each other for a long time.  The last time I went  
to her city, just to see her, I was disappointed to see how great  
the distance between us was.

They asked me to throw the rubbish into a dustbin which had some  
awful liquid accumulated at the bottom.

The girl with whom I was going around had been forbidden to be  
alone with me in the house.  We paid no attention to this  
prohibition but one day her parents appeared and I jumped out of  
the window.  They saw me.

I was driving a friend's car, and I got close to the pavement to  
ask my way and I struck a parked car.

I stayed alone in the dark at night in the mountain, waiting for  
my uncle.  I remember that I took a big stone and it calmed me.

[ During a summer holiday a French girl and I had becoe back  
home, I felt very sad.]

Once I had to clean a lavatory which was obstructed.  It was in a  
friend's country house and there was nobody there to help me.

I lost my study grant without having attended any exam in  
the career I had started, and it was too late to cancel my registration.
A party I went to last Christmas.
my mother had a nervous illness.
During my last exam.
I had to come back from my village last Christmas.
One day I went to see a rather disagreeable film (X).
Once I had to visit a rather special person.

Once, I accidentally injured a boy in the eye and he almost lost  
it.
I knew the feelings of a beloved person.
A fall during a climb, with almost with no previous experience.

On the occasion of assignment of tasks and responsibilities in  
which such an assignment, dispropotionately carried with it high  
responsibility and low ability of organisation and resolution.

Moving to an unknown place, away from the familiar surroundings  
and into a situation of loneliness.
I had to sleep in a bed at a hostel, which was full of dirt.

While shopping, a person close to us created an uncomfortable  
situation for those who were with her.

Incomprehension and repression towards a child's behaviour,  
commonly not accepted, and making the child cry.

In a dark street at 4 o'clock in the night and there was  
complete silence.

they broke the artistic work of several weeks.  Changes were  
made and it was broken without permission, they had no right to  
do this.

the train taking me to my military service left the station,  
on the platform remained relatives, projects and goodtimes.  I  
had a hard year ahead.

A situation of overt unfairness, manipulation of people and its  
consequences.

A children's film in which I played a clown, with spotlights,  
cameras and the director who demanded jumps and guffaws.

I was talking to a friend and he said something which was very  
funny.

I was young I saw a horror film.  Then I went to sleep,  
the film came back too my mind and the characters frighteneed my  
imagination.

In a confrontation with a person, he provoked me several times  
till I reacted in an angry way.  Fortunately there were no  
disastrous consequences.
I was watching a sad film and it affected me deeply.

I was reading a book.  It had nothing to do with the book  
itself but with the disagreable smell of the pages of the book.

In an exam I answered the questions rather carelessly and  
afterwards I thought that the exam would have been better had I  
answered more carefully.

I knew that there were, at last, no problems in making a  
journey that I had been wanting to make for a long time.
It was more that fear - anguish -that I felt before my last exam.

I had an argument with my best friend and I thought that I  
was right and she was not.

I realized that it was impossible for me to be as free as I  
had imagined and that I could not do anythong about it.

The first time I saw a pornographic film, all that in practice is  
so beautiful but on the screen appered as something mechanical,  
irrational, disgusting and dehumanizing.

I stated sharply something I was not very sure of and a few  
days later I was shown to be wrong.

I do or say something inappropriate which hurts people close  
to me.

a study tour got confirmed, I was happy all the time till     
the tour began.

I was walking down a road and suddenly a few dogs appeared at a fence  
and started barking angrily.  They were jumping and it seemed  
that they would come for me any time.

We went to visit my mother at the residence.  She was crying and  
said that she was about to die.  I believed all her complaints  
and continously thought of the possibility of loosing her.

My dog had been run over and died near the house.  We had to pick  
him up, cold and glassy eyed, to get rid of the corpse.

In an exam I answered the questions with very little  
assurance due to insufficiet preparation.

I received my report card in C.O.U.  I was afraid of obtaining  
low marks, but they were much higher than expected.
I had failed some subjects in mathematics.

I was at the table at a French friend's house.  They served me a  
big dish with roast cauliflower and sauce.  I had to eat it.

I was alone at home I broke a figure and then mended it.  A  
few days later my mother noticed it and asked me about it, I told  
her that I had no idea.

I fell crazily in love with a beautiful girl and she returned  
my love.

I was caught by the police and was kept with a group of  
delinquents, which added to my fear of being shut up.  I was  
afraid of the people near me and the future consequences.

I was the target of a great many insults and completely  
unfair accusations of a large group of people.
my best friend died, at the age of 16.

I entered a brothel and saw two sailors with a young  
prostitute who was not older than 18.

Having suffered a not very pretty sight, I reacted by uttering  
some very cruel and sharp words.

I came across an old friend whom I had not seen for a very  
long time.

I had an accident in which I hurt my eye.  I was afraid of having  
injured it badly.
I was accused of something I had not done.
A close friend died.
I saw some images of a decapitation in a horror film.

I slipped and fell in to a puddle and people started looking at  
me.
I made another person cry for an unjustified cause.

I received an unexpected letter from a friend I had met a short  
time before.  He sent me a poem and wished me good luck.  I felt  
very happy because I had great esteem for that person.

I was walking with another person a "gang" separted us and  
pushed me in to a house, hit me in the stomach and the face, then  
they left - leaving me bleeding.

A certain person started to say dreadful things very calmly, I  
felt hurt and disgusted.

A certain person whom I respect and esteem a lot pays me no  
attention.  She keeps up appearances but shows almost no interest  
in me.

In a bus I fell sick and vomitted in a bag.  The entire situation  
was disgusting in itself.

I rejected a person whom I had always thought to be a friend.  I  
told him so and he reacted angrily.  I felt guilty at not having  
realized it before and at having hurt him.

I received some good news : I obtained an amount of money I  
needed to buy something I had been planning to buy.

my relatives and I were in a car going slowly on a frozen  
road.

My parents were having a typical family argument.  I came in and  
saw the scene and became angry.
I was going away, leaving a dear person behind.

I visited a place in Morocco where they worked the leather.  I  
saw the skins emerged in a liquid which ressembled putrification.

I was in a cafe with another person when, suddenly, several close  
friends of my partner appeared.  I did not know what to do and my  
partner felt uncomfortable.
I talk to my friends.
I am walking on the streets and see a gang of thugs.
people harrass me I feel oppressed by their behavior.
I am with a friend and we have to leave each other.

I saw a film in which the man suffered from an illness and     
his skin came peeling off.
I was in the toilet and someone came in.

[ I act thinking that I know everything and I then realize  
that there were things I had not thought about, thus hurting  
others.]

On a dark night I felt that there were several people near me  
and I did not know who they were.

I learned that several people had died in the street due to   
the cold weather.

I saw in the newspapers, on the T.V, and magazines the  
chaotic situation caused by the drought and hunger in  
Mauritania.
The physical appearance of a meal.

I was with a group of people and everybody told me to do or say  
something.  It was a confusing, strong and traumatic situation  
for me.

One night, at a friend's place I realized that I had everything I  
most wished, around me.

During a demonstration I climbed up the closed central door of a  
bus.  the bus stopped I had to go back to the same place,  
afraid that the police would see me.

I saw parents punishing their little child for something he  
had not done.  In my opinion, even if he had done it he should  
not have been punished for it.

A friend of mine was hurt as he thought that our relationship was  
not the same as before and something had gone wrong.

I was young, one day in the car we fell sick and ended up  
vomitting on each other.

The parents of a friend of mine surprised us and another couple  
sleeping in thier place.

A friend of mine felt bad because of something I had done to  
something that belonged to him.

they told me that I had been admitted to the faculty of  
medicine.
Almost always I go to fetch the results of an exam.
[ No description.]

I decided not to out any longer with a girl whom I liked  
quite a lot.  This made me feel low for a some time.

I saw a program on T.V where they had to saw a skull for an         
operation.

I was watching T.V with my parents and some pornographic scenes  
came on, I felt uncomfortable and tried to distract my parents  
attention by talking to them.

I used an adjective for a person without knowing what it  
meant.   I got to know the meaning, I felt guilty as it was  
a clear and unfair insult.
I obtained good marks in a subject I had failed before.
a friend of mine told me a horror story.

I was with my family and we found some abandoned puppies.  I  
wanted to help them but everyone said no.  We then left.
At my grandfather's death.
Seeing a film in which there were several bloody crimes.

At a concert an old man arrived and began to danse, sing and do  
silly things.

I had an argument with a friend of mine.  She would not let me  
speak and then I began to shout at her.  She got angry and left,  
I did not try to prevent her from leaving.

I was told that they had got tickets for me for a film  
marathon I wanted to see.

We were on the road in a car a lorry bypassed us.  We had to  
swerve and we almost got run over.

I received a letter from some friends, who do not live in Madrid,  
telling me that they would not come on holiday.  I had arranged  
everythiing for them.
I found a big, black spider near a bag of food.

I had arranged to meet my friends at a certain place, and I was  
with other people.  My friends did not arrive and the people who  
were with me began to get tired.  My friends were one hour late.
The man I am going around with gave me a very special present.

I thought that I would be scolded for a comment I had made, which  
I should not have made.

My sister came back home and reproached me for not having tidied  
up the house, although I had been working all morning and she had  
done nothing.

At my grandfather's funeral.  I remembered that the thing he  
liked and respected most was earth, I thought that he had  
attained what he wanted and was not separated from it any longer.

In a very crowded shop I was distracted and missed my turn in the  
queue.  A woman who was behind me began to shout at me asking me  
either to pay more attention or to leave.

I saw a friend of mine, whom I had not seen for a long time  
and I had lost his address and telephone number.

I was in my village a bull jumped over a fence and started  
chasing my friends and me.  We were very frightened till we  
climbed up a tree.
I saw a car run over a child, out of carelessness.

I failed a subject despite the fact that I had studied quite a  
lot for it.
I was walking in a field which had a lot of manure.

I liked a boy and I would feel shy and then blush.  The more I  
wanted to avoid it the more I blushed.

I am not very affectionate and I feel guilty as I do not give as  
much affection as I receive.

I was spending the week-end with some friends.  We were waiting  
for another friend and we went to the meet him at the bus stop, a   
woman we met there told us that the coach had already left.  I  
was afraid that I would not see my friend, but at last we found  
him.

I was walking down a little village at night.  There was nobody  
in the steet.  A dog began to bark, I felt that it was following  
me.  Then I began to run, the other dogs started barking too.  At  
last I arrived home.
My parents did not let me go on holidays with my friends.
I was told that a friend of mine was going to Mexico for good.
Finding a hair in the soup.

I had promised to say goodbye to a person who was going on a  
trip, and I did not turn up.

I was on holidays, and I was going to meet a friend whom I had  
not seen for six months.  Again I felt very happy.

We were camping in the mountains, and a friend and I went for a  
walk.  It was getting darker and darker and we were not sure of  
the right way back.

I sent a book to a friend of mine.  The book meant a lot to me  
and he lost it.
To say goodbye to dear friends after the holidays.
Ever since I have been a child, the sight of any kind of wound.
At the seaside, a wave suddenly came and took off my bikini.

One night, I went out with some friends for dinner and I did not  
tell my parents that I would come back late.  I thought of  
phoning but in the end I did not.  I arrived home, my  
parents were very worried.

My sister in law was about to have a child, and there were some  
problems.  They had to do a Caesarean.  After a while, everything   
was all right.
Waiting for my marks in a difficult subject.

I gave some personal information to a friend of mine, and he told  
it to some others who were implicated in the affair.

There was a cat on the street.  It had been run over and its head was  
open.  We passed beside it.

At a meeting with over one hundred people, they decided who had to speak  
from the stand by drawing lots.

I had a small argument with a relative and some other people got  
implicated.  It resulted in a proper row.

Last course, I passed with good marks three subjects which I had  
previously failed.
I was attacked by a man at a bus stop at night.

My mother told me that I could not go to the mountains.  Despite  
my age, as long as I am in her house I must do what she says.

my nephew was taken to hospital with meningitis and we did  
not know what would happen.

I was drinking coffee in a cafe and I found a piece of scrubber  
in my cup.

One evening, I was with a group of friends having a talk.  There  
was a very trustful and neutralful atmosphere.

We were walking in the park at night.  It was very dark and very  
late.  We began to hear foot steps all around us, and we could  
not find our way out.

[ One day I arrived home rather tired and found the house..... In  
addition I was asked many questions which I did not want to  
answer.]

I was selected to do a rest for a foreign ballet but I did not  
have the money to do it.

In a film there was a scene in which a rat was sliding on a bed,  
leaving a trace of blood behind, finally it entered the mouth of  
one of the actors.

At a party, several comments were made about the personal  
situation of one of the people present.  She was rather affected  
and uncomfortable.

It was Saturday, my duties were over for a few hours and I could  
at last be with the people I wanted to see.

One night, I was alone at home.  My fear was caused by some  
strange noises which put my imagination to work.

I got to know about the reaction of a friend of mine in a  
certain situation.  I had not expected him to react that way.

I felt alone among a large number of people.  I was sad to see  
that nobody cared about what was happening to me.
I saw a sort of black worm being attacked by many ants.
I met a friend of mine after several months.
I noticed the negative changes in a friend's behaviour.

I was going to my village, after having been rather oppressed in  
Madrid.

I was watching a procession during the Holy week, and a penitent  
approached me.

My mother read a letter that a friend of mine had written to me  
telling me how she had got drunk the last time.

I found a cockroach crushed between two folders in my bedroom, I  
called my mother.

I ride my motorbike in my village and everyone stares at me as if  
I was a rare specimen.

I was spending a few days at my aunt's place.  One night I got  
home very late, I had told them I was going to a party but I went  
to another place.  They were very worried.

Last Summer I achieved someting that I had been wanting for a  
long time.

I was in a camp and went out for a walk at night on my own.  I lost   
my way and spent several hours looking for the camp.

My parents scolded me a lot for something I had not done.  It was  
my sister who had done it.
At the hypocrisy of some of my friends.

I greeted and embraced the wrong person thinking that it was my  
friend.

Due to a misunderstanding on my part, two of my best friends  
quarelled.

we got lost in Florence and the coach did not turn up until  
midnight.  I had no place to go to and there were strange reports  
at the police station.

an English teacher unfairly made me repeat a semester which  
I thought I had passed.  I had to ask my parents for some more  
money to carry on studying.

The person whom I liked most left me for a friend of mine, after  
several months of mutual help and a profound knowledge of each  
other.

In a park near our home, a group of young people who were  
strangely dressed were seated in the middle of the street.  They  
began to eat while carressing each other.

I feel this emotion very often I try to express my feelings  
in public, because other people do not understand my reactions  
and think that I am silly.

A friend of mine said in a group that she felt lonely and  
withdrawn from everyone because of mental deficiency.

I was at home alone, I felt a super-natural force, dangerous  
for me and the people close to me.

my father made my mother go through really terrible  
situations, I felt furious, impotent, nervous, upset, ........

a person whom I loved and admired a lot died.  I felt empty,  
lonely, helpless, without support, not knowing what to do.

I came to know that my father and his parents were : self  
interested, dirty, negative, egoist, bad peolpe,......

I think that the only time I really felt shame was I was  
very young and I had to defecate on the street.  I was very  
worried in case someone should see me.

I was young I felt guilty because I thought that I had  
commited a grave sin.

We were riding in a friend's car.  He was driving very fast and  
suddenly a another car crossed the road in front of us.  My  
friend had to turn the car rapidly.

I went to see the result of an exam and saw that I had  
failed.
I was getting up, I found a live cockroach in my bedroom.

The mother of a friend of mine passed by me and saw me sitting  
on a boy's lap.  I tried to greet her but could not help  
blushing.

A friend of mine had the sleeves of a leather coat stolen from  
his car.  It was me who had left them there for everyone to see.

The final marks were to be given in the morning.  I wanted to get  
there late because I was very afraid.  I arrived there,  
everybody was very happy and I had also passed.  We had a  
wonderful time all day long.

I went to visit a friend in hospital.  He was going to be  
operated the next day.  I was afraid that they would not let me  
in and I did not know what his reaction would be on seeing me.

A friend of mine played a joke on another friend over the  
telephone.  This friend, crying, called me and I got very angry  
and made the other person apologize.

I was at a friend's place for lunch and she fell ill and  
vomited.

I was dancing in a theatre.  I was not sure whether some frieends  
of mine had come to see me.  I was very scared of doing things  
wrong.
On holiday, seeing the lanscape in Gerona.
Travelling by coach on a rather narrow and wet road.

They wanted me to pay for a ticket twice because they said that  
the one I had was out of date.
I came back from my holidays.
I saw an insect going up my arm.
I entered a bar looking for a friend.

Arguing with my younger cousin.  She is rather a nuisance but I  
felt sorry.

some friends of mine asked me to go camping with them for a  
fortnight.

Once, I was very young, my mother left me alone in the  
house and came back very late.

my aunt told me angrily that I was a good-for-nothing and  
she was fed up with my behaviour.

my parents and sister went on a trip and I was separated  
from them for about three months.
a person I did not know hurt a friend of mine.

Once, I arrived home very late, my parents had an argument  
because of this; my mother wanted to stand up for me.

I phoned a friend of mine to ask her for news about the marks in  
an exam.  She told me that I had passed.

I was spending my summer holidays in a village.  My friend and I  
were coming back from a discotheque at night and we heard a noise  
from an alley.  We were very scared and we got into my friend's house.  
 A moment later, an unknown car picked up a person from this  
alley.

My mother and I had an argument over buying some clothes for me.   
She did not accept the fact that I did not like the same things  
as her, and we ended up shouting at each other.

One day, I was home and there was a phone call informing me that  
some of my relatives had died in an accident.

I saw a film in which there was a scene where women were cut  
to pieces.  Above all, it was the blood and the confusion which  
impressed me most.

I was walking to school and I passed by a red cross post where  
there were many soldiers.  They began to pass remarks at me.

A friend of mine trusted me to back her in a decision she had  
made.  But the moment came I did not agree with her opinion.

I was told that I had passed the statistics exam.  I had not  
expected this so I was very happy.
my grandfather died.
opened a box of biscuits and found worms inside.

I was young I was told to to the shop to buy a dozen eggs.   
I went and asked for one egg and the people in the shop laughed  
at me and so did my family I told them what had happened.

I arrived home late at night.  I know that my mother gets  
worried and this made me feel angry.

I was told that my daughter, who is at a boarding school,  
was very ill and that they needed me there the same day.

One day in a clinic, the father of a child came in and assaulted  
a colleague for something that she had not done deliberately.
I was told that my uncle had passed away.

One day I came back home, I found my favourite dish broken.   
I blamed the servant for it, later I found out that it was not  
the servant but my daughter who had broken it.
I did not give back a text book to a friend in time.

a cousin of mine was discharged from the hospital after        
a long illness.  I had thought that this illness would never end.

a man who had a knife grabbed me and threatened me with it,    
during my holidays in Monze.

A certain friend tried to push me off a seat in a very violent  
way for no apparent reason.  It may be that he was excited about  
something.

the neighbour of a friend of mine was stabbed to death by  
thieves in Kabwe.  They stole his van.

we were young, a friend of mine tried to dissect a frog while

 all my friends had done something wrong, or may be it was the

I blamed my niece for misplacing my book, she denied having

I was about six years old, I mistook a cat for a leopard

a person the same age as me insisted that I call him

I failed the grade 7 twice and only passed it the third

I was going around with a foreigner's wife and my entire family

they found out that I was absent from school, I had gone to

I was accused of having refused to do some hostel work while

I usually come back home early but this day I came home back late

I got pass marks in the H.S.S compulsory courses while most

I heard that I had made it to the second year at UNZA.

my father's home was to be broken into by thieves who had

a friend tried to back bite me on false grounds.  This made

someone whom I trusted, disappointed me terribly.

I was with my colleagues and we met an elderly man who was very

I lied to my mum, who later came to know that what I had

someone tried to bewitch me and my friends at night.

I was victimized for running away with a girl who was  
somebody else's wife and niece at the same time.  I was very

1976, Soweto uprising in South Africa and the racist Gout's  
reaction to the students demands concerning the educational

I got  grade "C" in M160 at the end of my first year at  
UNZA.  I had expected a "C+" or a "B" as M160 is easy, going by my  
capacity in mathematics.

I was walking at night, I saw fire suspended in the air and  
it was split into several segments by something I could not see.   
I suspected that it was witch-craft.

I was refused a transfer from my school to another, simply  
because it was far away from my house.

I was taking an exam in grade 5.  The examinator found me  
with a note-book and accused me of copying, All the students

I was caught stealing mangoes in a certain compound.

I went to town in a double dekker bus.  The bus was about to  
fall on the way the driver controlled it.  It had almost  
fallen.

I was in form 3, my aunts lied to my daddy telling him that  
I had told them that I was pregnant.  My daddy  told my mother

I received a letter telling me that my mother was very ill.

a drunkard, in town yelled at me saying that I was a

I went to my room-mate's drawer to see if she had an iron

I had my four children.
two of my children were critically ill with measles.
I got a low grade in an administration course.
I got divorced from my husband after ten years of marriage.

my mother betrayed me by obtaining money from my husband  
we were separated - pending divorce.
I beat up my son for having beaten up his sister.

This happened I went to check my first year results, I had   
thought that I would fail and I found that I had a clear pass in

I woke up at night to find a fire spreading towards the bed

a friend of mine was trying to make a fool out of me.

I experienced this emotion my friend committed suicide after

I heard of the assassination of the Indian prime-minister,

I got drunk at a party and made a fool of myself by

I was caught sneaking back into the house at night after

a thief broke into my house at night.
my sister broke my china tea set.
I felt very sad my son died after a short illness.
I met my best friend's husband with a prostitute.
I failed to answer a simple question.
I learnt that I was selected for form I.

a friend, who has been with me at school, failed to make it

I choked on a cold drink in front of girls who were strangers.
I passed the grade 7 exam.

I was told by the doctor, after many months of coughing,

a cousin of mine took my bottle of T.B tablets, put water in

This happened one of my uncles died just whan I was

five of my friends at the secondary school found out the bad

my mother returned from a holiday, I told her a lie i.e my

The time I qualified to enter secondary school.

One evening I saw the old guard-man I knew, change into something

I was mistakenly accused of being a thief I accidently

The day I woke up to find that a kitten I had wanted to keep had

The day I was forced to use a public convenience place in town.   
It was so filthy that it really made me sick.

My mother caught me stealing some food I was a young  
boy.

I gave in to what my wife wanted and locked the cat out, it

I felt neutral I came to know Christ.  That is I became a

I broke the window pane of my next door neighbour's house.
I heard that my nephew had passed away.
my father thought that I was an unrelaible son.
I insulted an elderly person for no reason.

my uncle gave me my first year's results.  I opened the

I turned the knob of my granny's two band radio and did not hear  
any broadcast,  " What ! Have I broken the knob ? How much does  
it cost ? What if the spare part is not available ? "  --I did  
not know how to tune a radio.

I peeped into Maurine's bedroom and saw two people - Maurine anbd  
my step-dad.  I thought, " Why did she break her promises ? Why  
had she invited me ? Why do old men go for young girls ? "

I missed the chance of becoming a graduate in mining  
engineering, after having prayed one week in the church I was

I stormed into the room, hoping to cool myself with some soft

Kaley there and he explained, " Your aunt has sold it as she

This was the girl I was in love with accepted my proposal

It was I dreamt that I had encountered Satan, he wanted to grab me

This was I found out that a cousin of mine had taken away my

I failed a test at my primary school.  I was then in grade 7

This was I saw, for the first time, a naked woman  
(prostitute) run away from a house after having been discovered

This was I was discovered stealing a piece of bread at home,  
I was very hungry a few hours before supper.

I was in grade 7.  We had an inter-house volley-ball competition.  
 In Luapula I was the youngest member of the team and I scored   
the winning goal using my head.  I jumped up with neutral and fell

I was escorting a relative on a bike, we passed by a dark road  
with bushas on each side.  Half way down this road, suddenly, we    
saw a white dog appear from one side.  Before we could do

The comrade staying next doors insulted me for what he called   
the misuse of his iron.  He called me stupid, self centered etc.   
I wanted to punch him but instead went for a walk to the mining  
school to cool off.

A close relative was at odds with a very powerful firm.  All his

loo.
A pig in the well from which we drink.

I bumped my dad's car in a lamp post.  He was not at home then,  
neither was he home I left for the campus.  I did not tell

I was at school whhen I received a letter from the dean of my

This was at secondary school, a prefect framed up some case and

I travelled all the way to my former school to collect my

My sister was in a hospital, later in the evening we received the

at school I thought that I was going to get the best results

I felt guilty I heard the results of my friend, who had

My being admitted to UNZA.
While paddling in the river during a storm.  I feared drowning.

I entrusted a friend with the delivery of some money to my

Over an argument.

I had sufficient amount of money, I brought more clothes for

My first kiss.

a friend left me and went back home for good.

I discovered that the people I trusted most were talking

I was running in front of a crowd I slipped and fell on a

I watched a very terrfying film in LT2.  This film really pushed

" I have been hearing rumours that you have not been allowing  
people in your room," he said.  This sentence really shot my

One Saturday morning I had got ready to go out swimming with my

One day I went to town to get my grocery.  On my way back, I took

I had gone to aa bookshop to buy some books.  Somehow, I got very  
cross with the security guard checking through what I had bought.  
 I lost my temper and screamed at him.  Later I felt very ashamed

I heard that a close relative of mine had given birth at a

someone chased me from his house.

I realized that I did not have the basic things needed by a

some people, including me, are treated in a way which

someone I know was caught in an "adultery" situation.

I did something wrong in the past and denied having done it

The shooting started and we all lay down to protect ourselves

I went to the dining hall and found that the cooks were cleaning

a girl I wanted very much, said "yes" and fell in love with

One evening, I had gone fishing with my friends, we heard

my uncle died.

I was double crossing my fiancee and one day she caught me red

I took some money from my parent's house without asking them for

I was approaching my exam time and my books got stolen.  I was in

I was annoyed this particular day as it seemad that the odds were

I discovered that my mother had been involved in adultery.

I was caught stealing food at my aunt's place.  I had tried to

I was accepted at UNZA.
I heard a lion roar for the first time.

a friend told me that my education had nothing to do with

I experienced neutral I got the results - I had made it to the

I was going home, I saw somathing which looked like a snake

This happened recently, I  was in the dining hall and one of my

I insulted the girl to whom I had proposed she turned me

my first child was born.

my wife died in hospital, she was pregnant and had undergone

my best friend started getting involved in my private

I was very drunk at a certain wedding party and I got involved in

I send a word to my boss through my servant telling him that I

I received a letter of acceptance from UNZA.

We were driving at night and I realized that a car was following

I reachad home to find that my baby had not been bathed and fed.

I saw a dead child which was not covered, it had been knocked

I saw a friend's husband with another woman.
I scolded my sister without waiting for her explanation.

I accused my husband of being late deliberately he came to

I was appointed by the Ministry of health to join the

the dean of UNZA asked me to vacate a big flat I was

my close friend was involved in an accident and passed away

A patient, to whom I had given a powerful medicine, shouted at me

I was sleeping I heard the neighbours screaming, I peeped

I was annoyed a person higher up asked me why a particular

I was in a train a woman started talking loudly and

After a jogging session I had severe abdominal cramps and this

A certain woman had asked me to make something for her and I kept

I was accepted for my third year (G-10) at my former

I had gone for a medical check-up at the U.T.H and failed to make

I was mistreated by my step-mother.
my aunt passed away in early 1982.

I failed to secure employment after my form 5 in Lusaka despite

I failed my grade 7 exam at the first attempt in 1975.  My  
father and the entire family thought that I was finished in life.  
 I really felt like hiding.

I beat up a first year student at my secondary school in  
my capacity as the deputy head boy.  He had woken up late in the

a drunkard barged into a room where my friend and I had run

my family and I heard of the death of my grandfather.  We had  
 seen him a few weeks earlier and it seemed that he had just been

a boy put a handful of cooked potatoes down my dress and  
there was no water to clean up.

a soppy poem that I had written to a boy was found and every

After a long time (of no communication with him, physical  
illness and worry) my lover came to see me, I least expected

Birds had made nests in our thatched roof and they were flying

My elder sister scolded me in front of my younger sisters and

On Christmas day a drunk man came to our house without a shirt

I wet my bed at boarding school.

My baby sister was 2-3 months old and I was trying to get

I came back from work one day, the friends of my son told me

My room-mate locked up our room without specifying where I would

I lost my grandfather whom I loved very much.  I had not known

The teacher of one course gave me 10 questions with sub-questions

I was to inform the neighbour on my left that a robber had been

I did not do it and the same day the thieves broke into this

my father bought me a suit.
After having taken an exam i feared having failed it.

I was badly beaten up by one of my friends during a wedding

I was very sad at hearing that my grandfather had passed away.

I was ashamed at being the only one to have got a C+ in ED120

I heard that I had achieved a place in form I.

I had gone home for a week-end and I came back I found that

my father passed away.

Someone stole a K10 note and the teacher thought that it was me

One day my mother went to visit her friends.  she came back

I saw my family after a separation of one year.

my little sister was sick at home and I thought that she

I found out that my sister had been playing with my

one of my best friends commited siucide during these

I fell in love with "X".  Overnight I felt confidence, self-esteem,

a thunder belt hit the roof top of the building I was in.

my room-mate locked me out deliberately, before an exam due

my friends died one after the other.  The first died in a

my cousin put feaces in my washing.  A silly idea which was

Getting drunk and creating a lot of trouble at a place I respect

I took a small boy's share of choclale.  He was our guest

The day I got a telegram telling me that I had been selected for

The day I encountered a queer mamba face to face in a chunk of

my friends tried to discriminate against my friendship with

The day my teacher of Latin and French died.

The day I went to eat dinner in the dinning hall and found a

I felt ashamed of myself the first time I drank as nobody in the

The day I came home drunk after having attended a disco party.

I was very happy I received the year end results as I was

I was caught doing something I was not supposed to do.  I did

I told my friend something confidential which was supposed to

I remember that my mother died the day was sad and every

thieves broke into our house, I was disgusted by their

I bribed the person who caught me doing something I was not

I was caught doing something bad and I bribed the person who

I received a positive answer from my appeal to withdraw my

I was a passenger in a vehicle suddenly another vehicle came

I learnt of the death of a friend.

I came across a blind man sitting in one of the corridors and

I first came to the campus.

 I was afraid they threatened to take me and my girl to the

an argument with a friend of mine over our behaviour towards

I was denied my favourite dish at the dinning hall (shima

my library books were overdue and I did not have the money

my father did not get back from Chipata on time, he was thus

I almost did something awful with a friend of mine and

thieves broke into our neighbour's house and later we heard

my aunt scolded me for something I was not responsible for.

my cousin passed away unexpectedly and tragically (a

my mother got a terrible beating from my father.  It was so

my friend had a child out of wedlock.

we forced a friend to chew a poisonous herb in primary

At boarding school someone put a lot of tiny thorns on my bed.

my grandfather died.

My room-mate was drunk, he vomited on the floor and fell face

As a kid my mother caught me stealing sugar and giving it to a

I got into a bad fight in a bar and my friend received a bad cut

I felt very frightened a robber broke into our house and

 I was looking at the man with his hand on the trigger.

my sister died, she was only sixteen she was put to

I witnessed an accident.

my father found me in bed with a girl, we were deep in actioon

I won some coins in a small competion.

I went home late one evening and saw that the security lights

My little niece, who is very talkative, suddenly became very
